alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Palo Duro Canyon; Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 12:31AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Armstrong, northern Randall, Carson and southeastern Potter Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 1230 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Amarillo to 7 miles northwest of Panhandle. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Canyon, Panhandle, Claude, Lake Tanglewood, Mescalero Park, Washburn, Palo Duro Canyon, Goodnight, Timbercreek Canyon and Pantex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for the Panhandle of Texas.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Carson; Palo Duro Canyon; Potter; Randall
